banner.text: An official website of the United States government
banner.aria_label: Official website of the United States government

domain.heading: Official websites use .gov
domain.text: A .gov website belongs to an official government organization in the United States.

https.heading: Secure .gov websites use HTTPS
https.posttext: or https:// means you’ve safely connected to the .gov website. Share sensitive information only on official, secure websites.

banner.text: An official website of the United States government
banner.aria_label: Official website of the United States government,

domain.heading: Official websites use .mil
domain.text: A .mil website belongs to an official U.S. Department of Defense organization.

https.heading: Secure .mil websites use HTTPS
https.posttext: or https:// means you’ve safely connected to the .mil website. Share sensitive information only on official, secure websites.

banner.text: Un sitio oficial del Gobierno de Estados Unidos
banner.action: Así es como usted puede verificarlo
banner.aria_label: Un sitio oficial del Gobierno de Estados Unidos

domain.heading: Los sitios web oficiales usan .gov
domain.text: Un sitio web .gov pertenece a una organización oficial del Gobierno de Estados Unidos.

https.heading: Los sitios web seguros .gov usan HTTPS
https.posttext: o https:// significa que usted se conectó de forma segura a un sitio web .gov. Comparta información sensible sólo en sitios web oficiales y seguros.
